forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 58. Southwest wind 5 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 74, with temperatures falling to around 72 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 3 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun sinks gently into the horizon, Downtown San Francisco basks under a cloak of calm, clear skies. The evening is poised to wrap you in a soft embrace, with temperatures settling around a comfortable 58 degrees. A light west-southwest breeze weaves through the streets, playfully stirring the air—and perhaps even rustling the pages of a well-loved book. Tonight’s promise is one of tranquility, perfect for a leisurely stroll along the waterfront or a quiet moment sipping tea while listening to the gentle hum of the city’s heartbeat.

Tomorrow, the sun will rise, ushering in a mostly sunny day where temperatures will peak near a balmy 74 degrees. As daylight unfurls, the warmth will invite you to dive into the delights of this urban oasis. With a light wind creating a refreshing atmosphere, this is an opportune time to don layers, allowing you to adapt seamlessly as the day transitions from warmth to the classic evening cool of the Bay Area. Consider exploring local gems—perhaps an art exhibit or a cozy café where you can linger over a treat while watching the world drift by. With minimal fog lingering in the distant hills, the view promises to be as invigorating as the afternoon breeze.
